question: How often do you go shopping for new clothes?

answers.answer: It depends on my schedule and budget, but I try to go shopping for new clothes at least once every couple of months.
I'm a bit of a shopaholic, so I tend to go shopping for new clothes at least once a month. It's a hobby of mine and I love discovering new styles and trends.
I don't go shopping for new clothes very often, usually only when I have a special event or occasion coming up that requires a specific outfit.

question: Where do you usually shop for clothes?

answers.answer: I mostly shop for clothes at chain stores that offer affordable and trendy options. It's convenient and I can usually find what I'm looking for.
I'm a big fan of online shopping, so I usually shop for clothes at various online retailers. It's convenient and I can browse a wider selection of items.
I usually shop for clothes at a variety of stores, depending on what I'm looking for. Sometimes I'll shop at department stores, other times through online retailers.

question: Why do you choose to buy clothes at those services or platforms?

answers.answer: I like to buy clothes from department stores because they often have great sales and discounts. Plus, I can easily find a variety of styles and sizes in one location.

I prefer shopping at online platforms because they have a wider selection of clothing options to choose from. Additionally, I can easily compare prices and find deals without having to physically visit multiple stores.
I choose to buy clothes from boutiques because they offer unique and one-of-a-kind pieces. The personalized shopping experience and attention to detail also make it more enjoyable.

question: In one year, how much do you spend on clothes? Do you think that amount is reasonable?

answers.answer: I spend about 10 million dong on clothes every year, but I think it's a reasonable amount because I like to stay up to date with the latest fashion trends.
I usually spend around 5 million dong on clothes each year, which I think is reasonable considering I like to invest in quality pieces that will last me a long time.
I usually spend around 3 million dong on clothes each year, but I try to buy second-hand or thrifted clothes to save money and reduce waste.
I don't spend a lot on clothes, maybe around 500,000 dong per year. I usually only buy clothes when I need them, like for special occasions or when my old clothes wear out.

question: What kind of clothes do you prefer to buy?

answers.answer: I prefer to buy comfortable and practical clothes that I can wear in different situations. I usually choose simple designs that match easily with other pieces.
I prefer to buy clothes that are functional and appropriate for my lifestyle. I look for clothes that are suitable for my work or hobbies and that I can wear comfortably throughout the day.
I like to buy clothes that are affordable and within my budget. I look for deals and discounts and try to save money while still finding clothes that I like.

question: Do you follow the latest fashion trends or have your own style?

answers.answer: I tend to stick to my own style rather than following the latest fashion trends. I prefer clothes that make me feel comfortable and confident, and I don't feel the need to constantly change my wardrobe to fit in with the latest trends.
I enjoy experimenting with different styles and bringing them into my collection if they fit. However, I also have certain classic pieces that I prefer to wear all the time.

I think it's important to have a signature style that reflects your personality and makes you feel good. While I do pay attention to fashion trends, I prefer to choose clothes that I love and that suit my body type and personality.

question: How do you choose or decide the clothes that suit you?

answers.answer: Comfort is a priority for me when choosing clothes. I look for clothes that are made from high-quality materials and have a good fit on my body.

I like to choose clothes based on the occasion or event that I'm attending. If it's a formal event, I'll look for elegant dresses or suits, but if it's a casual event, I'll choose more relaxed and comfortable outfits.

I consider the price and value of the clothes before making a purchase. I prefer to invest in high-quality clothes that will last a long time, rather than buying cheap clothes that will fall apart quickly.

question: Do you try on clothes before buying them?

answers.answer: Yes, I always try on clothes before buying them in physical stores to make sure they fit properly and look good on me.

I prefer to try on clothes before buying them, but with the pandemic and the convenience of online shopping, I've started taking my measurements and using size guides to make sure I get the right fit.
I don't always try on clothes before buying them, especially if I'm familiar with the brand and their sizing. But if it's a new brand or style, I will usually try it on to be safe.

I have a general idea of what styles and brands work for me, so I don't always feel the need to try clothes on before buying them. But if I'm unsure or it's a special occasion, I will definitely try the clothes first.

question: What is the most expensive or cheapest item of clothing that you have bought?

answers.answer: The cheapest item of clothing I have bought was a t-shirt on sale for only 40,000 dong. It's nothing special, but it's a comfortable and casual option for everyday wear. It lasted for more than a year.
Last year, I bought a leather jacket for 5 million dong, which I was somewhat regretting for the following 2 months. However, it's a classic style that will last for years to come.
The most expensive item of clothing I have bought was a custom-made suit for 20 million dong. It was worth it though, as it fits perfectly and makes me feel confident at formal events.

question: What is the most recent item of clothing that you have bought?

answers.answer: I recently purchased a new pair of jeans. Mine was pretty old, so I needed a new pair for casual outings and these ones fit perfectly and were a great price.
I bought a new workout outfit, I believe it’s called a “tank top”. It's made from stretch fiber that will keep me comfortable during my workouts.
The most recent item of clothing I bought was a new pair of running shoes. I wanted to invest in a high-quality pair that would last a long time and provide good support for my hobby.

question: Do you buy second-hand clothes? Why or why not?

answers.answer: I occasionally buy second-hand clothes because it's a great way to save money, and sometimes you can find high-quality items that are barely used.
Yes, I love buying second-hand clothes! It's a fun way to explore different styles and brands, and I feel good knowing that I'm reducing my impact on the environment.
No, I don't buy second-hand clothes because I prefer to have brand new items and I like the feeling of being the first person to wear them. I also worry about the cleanliness of the clothes.

question: Do you like trying new and different brands, or sticking to your favorite ones? Why did you choose that?

answers.answer: I prefer to stick to my favorite brands, as I have found that they consistently offer clothing that fits me well and suits my personal style. Additionally, I appreciate their reliability and trustworthiness.

I like trying new and different brands, as it helps me stay on top of the latest fashion trends and keeps my wardrobe fresh and exciting. However, I do have my favorite brands that I always come back to for their high-quality pieces.

I prefer to stick to my favorite brands, as I have found that their clothing fits me well and suits my personal style. However, I am open to trying new brands if they offer something unique and different that I haven't found elsewhere.

question: Do you think online shopping platforms are suitable for shopping for clothes? Why or why not?

answers.answer: Yes, I think online shopping platforms are suitable for shopping for clothes because they often have sales and discounts that aren't available in-store, and you can shop from the comfort of your own home.

No, I don't think online shopping platforms are suitable for shopping for clothes because you can't try on the clothes beforehand, and you can't feel the fabric or see the color and texture in person.

No, I don't think online shopping platforms are suitable for shopping for clothes because the shipping times can be unpredictable, and you may not receive the clothes in time for a specific event or occasion.
